messages.message:
Forrest
I am going to go up to penny arcade expo, September 4th-6th. Let me know if any of you guys are interested in going.

Leah
We're both really interested, Matt moreso since he LOVES Penny Arcade. I'd be going just because it's a gaming convention in the northwest (where we want to end up eventually).

We might be broke from DEFCON, but I'll tell you that we're both interested: so a strong maybe (all depends on moneys). Keep us in the loop about what's going on with it

Forrest
I have 2 friends who are enforcers (pax staff) up at pax, you guys might be able to crash with me at one of their houses if you don't mind sleeping on the floor. I can ask if you want. I am probably going to fly up on Thursday and fly back on Monday. tickets are $50 for all 3 days if you preorder.

Forrest
also if you decide to go make sure you preregister since only people who preregister can qualify for the omegathon

Sherman
where is this going on at?

Forrest
Penny Arcade Expo, September 4th-6th Seattle Convention Center
http://www.paxsite.com/
Penny Arcade Expo 2009
Because PAX is about culture, our keynote speakers are always tough to pick. We don’t have that laser-like focus for the show, so it’s not like some guy with a powerpoint deck that rattles off charts and numbers for an hour is going to cut it. ...
paxsite.com
